name: Modern K-Art
description:
This is a 10min game and my first Unity project. This is a collection of minigames I made to practice implementing various features. The thematic concept is that by completing each minigame, you will have made some sort of art  - especially the second half which is a bit more dynamic. Hope you have fun!

WASD to move

Space or Mouse for actions

Mechanics learned and applied:

- Click & Drag / Transform and velocity movements / tilemaps / coyote time / I-frames /  application of FEEL (camera shake/audio/flickers) / logic for tracking objectives

Special thanks to Kenney (@KenneyNL) for some of the audio files I used in this project. He's an amazing resource for aspiring developers.
